


RRDDUMP(1)                   rrdtool                   RRDDUMP(1)


NNNNAAAAMMMMEEEE
       rrdtool dump - dump the contents of an RRRRRRRRDDDD in human
       readable form

SSSSYYYYNNNNOOOOPPPPSSSSIIIISSSS
       rrrrrrrrddddttttoooooooollll dddduuuummmmpppp _f_i_l_e_n_a_m_e [--------ffffuuuullllllll|----ffff]

DDDDEEEESSSSCCCCRRRRIIIIPPPPTTTTIIIIOOOONNNN
       The dddduuuummmmpppp function prints the contents of an RRRRRRRRDDDD in human
       readable form.

       _f_i_l_e_n_a_m_e
               The name of the RRRRRRRRDDDD you want to dump.

       --------ffffuuuullllllll|----ffff
               By default only the headers of the RRRRRRRRDDDD are
               printed. With this option you get the actual data
               as well.

AAAAUUUUTTTTHHHHOOOORRRR
       Tobias Oetiker <oetiker@ee.ethz.ch>




































29/Mar/98                  19990426.22                          1
